trial_identification.studytitle: Study of BMS-986158 in Subjects With Select Advanced Solid Tumors
trial_identification.scientifictitle: A Phase I/IIa Trial With BMS-986158, a Small Molecule Inhibitor of the Bromodomain and Extra-Terminal (BET) Proteins, in Subjects With Selected Advanced Solid Tumors

interventions.interventions:
Treatment: drugs - BMS-986158
Experimental: Part 1 A (Dose Escalation): Treatment Arm A - Subjects will be treated at increasing doses of BMS-986158 until the maximum tolerated dose is reached.
Experimental: Part 1A (Dose Escalation): Treatment Arm B - Subjects will be treated at increasing doses of BMS-986158 until the maximum tolerated dose is reached.
Experimental: Part 1A (Dose Escalation): Treatment Arm C - Subjects will be treated at increasing doses of BMS-986158 until the maximum tolerated dose is reached.
Experimental: Part 2A (Dose Expansion): Treatment Arm A - Subjects will be treated at maximum tolerated dose.
Experimental: Part 2A (Dose Expansion): Treatment Arm B - Subjects will be treated at maximum tolerated dose.
Experimental: Part 2A (Dose Expansion): Treatment Arm C - Subjects will be treated at maximum tolerated dose.
Treatment: drugs: BMS-986158

primaryOutcome.outcome: Safety as measured by the rate of adverse events (AEs) and Serious Adverse Events (SAEs) - Safety as measured by the rate of incidence of adverse events (AEs) at its worst grade, serious adverse events (SAEs) at its worst grade, adverse events leading to discontinuations, deaths, frequency of laboratory test toxicity grade shifting from baseline
primaryOutcome.timepoint: Safety will be evaluated from the time that the subject signs the informed consent, and for 30 days after the last dose of study drug or until AEs have returned to = grade 1 or baseline

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Best Overall Response
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: approximately every 8 weeks until-last dose of BMS-986158, expected average of 4 months

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Objective Response Rate (ORR)
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: approximately every 8 weeks until-last dose of BMS-986158, expected average of 4 months

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Duration of Response
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: approximately every 8 weeks until-last dose of BMS-986158, expected average of 4 months

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Progression Free Survival (PFS)
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: approximately every 8 weeks until-last dose of BMS-986158, expected average of 4 months

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Progression Free Survival Rate (PFSR) at week 't'
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: approximately every 8 weeks until-last dose of BMS-986158, expected average of 4 months

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Maximum observed plasma concentration (Cmax) for single dose of BMS-986158
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Time of maximum observed plasma concentration (Tmax) for single dose of BMS-986158
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero to time of last quantifiable concentration (AUC(0-T)) for single dose of BMS-986158
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Area under the concentration-time curve in one dosing interval (AUC(TAU)) for single dose of BMS-986158
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Apparent terminal phase half-life (T-HALF) for single dose of BMS-986158
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero extrapolated to infinite time (AUC(INF)) for single dose of BMS-986158
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Apparent total body clearance, reported only for parent, not for metabolite (CLT/F) for single dose of BMS-986158
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Apparent volume of distribution of terminal phase, reported only for parent, not for metabolite (Vz/F) for single dose of BMS-986158
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Maximum observed plasma concentration (Cmax) for multiple dose of BMS-986158
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Time of maximum observed plasma concentration (Tmax) for multiple dose of BMS-986158
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero to time of last quantifiable concentration (AUC(0-T)) for multiple dose of BMS-986158
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Area under the concentration-time curve in one dosing interval (AUC(TAU)) for multiple dose of BMS-986158
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: The minimum observed concentration within a dosing interval (Cmin) for multiple dose of BMS-986158
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Concentration at the end of a dosing interval (Ctau) for multiple dose of BMS-986158
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Trough observed plasma concentration (this includes predose concentrations (C0) and concentrations at the end of dosing interval (Ctau)) (Ctrough) for multiple dose of BMS-986158
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Degree of Fluctuation or Fluctuation Index ([Cmax-Cmin)/Css-avg]) (DF) for multiple dose of BMS-986158
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: [Cmax - Cmin] / Cmin; to be calculated at steady-state (Swing) for multiple dose of BMS-986158
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Accumulation Index (AI) for multiple dose of BMS-986158 - Ratio of an exposure measure at steady-state to that after the first dose (exposure measure includes AUC(TAU), Cmax and Ctau)
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Effective elimination half-life that explains the degree of accumulation observed for a specific exposure measure (T-HALFeff) for multiple dose of BMS-986158
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Ratio of metabolite Cmax to parent Cmax, corrected for molecular weight (MR_Cmax)
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Ratio of metabolite AUC(0-T) to parent AUC(0-T), corrected for molecular weight (MR_AUC(0-T))
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Ratio of metabolite AUC(INF) to parent AUC(INF), corrected for molecular weight (following single dose only) (MR_AUC(INF))
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Ratio of metabolite AUC(TAU) to parent AUC(TAU), corrected for molecular weight (MR_AUC(TAU))
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Summary Changes in Expression of BET regulated Genes in Blood
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 through Cycle 2 Day 15 dosing

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Changes in QTcF
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 8 Day 8 of dosing for 1A , Cycle 1 Day 1 to Cycle 2 Day 8 of dosing for 2A

eligibility.inclusivecriteria:
For more information regarding BMS clinical trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com
- Must have triple negative breast cancer, ovarian (Serous histology for expansion phase), small cell lung cancer, or other solid tumors
- Expected to have life expectancy of at least 3 months
- Men and women 18 years old or older
- At least one measurable lesion at baseline by CT or MRI as per response evaluation criteria in solid tumors (RECIST) v1.1
- Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) of 0 to 1
eligibility.exclusivecriteria:
- Serious or uncontrolled medical disorders
- Concomitant second malignancies
- Uncontrolled or significant cardiovascular disease
- Inadequate bone marrow function
Other protocol defined inclusion/exclusion criteria could apply

ethicsAndSummary.summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics, and pharmacodynamics of BMS-986158 in subjects with select advanced solid tumors.
